Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.title: CSR01 - Confirm Status of Last Meeting's Action Items
Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.description: Verify completion status of all action items from previous meeting

Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.title: CSR02 - Implementation Plan-of-Action Updated
Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.description: The comprehensive written lifetime financial strategy for this client has been reviewed within the last four months and, as a result, action items and recommendations have been added, deleted or amended on The Greatest Probability Strategy (GPS) step-by-step implementation plan-of-action.

Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.title: CSR03 - Unfinished Recommendations are Updated
Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.description: Any and all uncompleted action items on The Greatest Probability Strategy (GPS) have been updated with new target dates and the impact has been reflected and updated in the lifetime capital projection within the past four months.

Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.title: CSR04 - Debts are Updated on The Circle Chart
Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.description: The Circle Chart (TCC), a one-page report, listing both spouses' names, dates of birth, current age, every growth/goal asset, every investment or financial account, all personal debt/liabilities, and all inflows and outflows has been updated prior to every Dry-Run Prep Meeting (within the past four months).

Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.title: CSR05 - The Since Inception Report Completed
Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.description: Prior to every Client Progress Meeting a single-page report called The Progress Since Inception Report of this client's relationship with our firm has been updated within the past four months. This completed report is to be included in The Client Prep Packet.

Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.title: CSR06 - The Growth Progress Since Last Meeting Report Completed
Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.description: Complete The Progress Report Since Last Meeting listing Growth/Goal Asset Value Total, Current Growth Asset Value, Total Value of All Subsequent Deposits, and Total Value of All Client Withdrawals since the last meeting.

Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.title: CSR07 - The Growth Progress Since Inception Report Completed
Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.description: Generate comprehensive progress report showing growth from inception to current date

Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.title: CSR08 - The Goals Progress Report Completed
Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.description: Prior to every Client Progress Meeting a single-page report called The Goal Progress Report has been updated for this client within the past four months listing the amount (in dollars) required for the accomplishment of each goal benchmarked against the current value of the growth assets.

Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.title: CSR09 - The Numbers History Report Completed
Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.description: Prior to every Client Progress Meeting a single page report called The Numbers History has been updated (every four months) showing Cash Reserves, Growth/Goal Assets, and Debt for every client meeting date.

Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.title: CSR10 - The Circle Chart Completed
Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.description: Complete comprehensive Circle Chart showing all client financial information

Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.title: CSR11 - The Comprehensive Safety Review Exercise Completed
Client Service Rep - Meeting Packets.description: Within the past twelve months the Deliverables Team has fully discussed every danger and threat to the comprehensive written lifetime financial plan with strategies developed for each, to include a discussion with every Subject Matter Expert (SME) advising this client.

Preparing for Progress Meeting.title: DRPM Meeting
Preparing for Progress Meeting.description: Conduct Dry-Run Prep Meeting with all team members. Review HPCs, discuss biggest issues, review GPS with team and ensure priority order. FATHOM MEETING LINK included.

Preparing for Progress Meeting.title: Corrections from DRPM Notes Made to Packet
Preparing for Progress Meeting.description: Make all necessary corrections to meeting packet based on DRPM feedback

Preparing for Progress Meeting.title: Packet Sealed and Made Available to TA
Preparing for Progress Meeting.description: Finalize and distribute completed packet to Trusted Advisor

Preparing for Progress Meeting.title: CSR Meeting
Preparing for Progress Meeting.description: Conduct Comprehensive Safety Review Meeting with client. Goal: give client an overwhelming sense of progress and confidence. Includes intro and extro scripts, goal changes, meeting notes, and action items.

After Progress Meeting.title: Send Post Meeting Notes and Action Items
After Progress Meeting.description: Distribute meeting notes and action items to all relevant parties

After Progress Meeting.title: Archive Meeting and Create Next Meeting Project in ASANA
After Progress Meeting.description: Archive completed meeting and set up next meeting project template
